questions.question_text:
Your company makes use of Dynamics 365 for Customer Service.

You have configured a customer service business unit as a parent of a call center, a digital response, and an escalation business unit. These business units all have their own queues. Customer service cases are directed to the correct parties via the queues. You have not amended any security roles.

You have been tasked with making sure that a user in the customer service business unit is able to read queues in both the parent and child business units.

You assign the user the CSR Manager security role.

Does the action achieve your objective?

discussion.content: A, CSR Manager role will give access to the child business unit queues

Correct.
Append is a privilege and not a Access Level.
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/power-platform/admin/security-roles-privileges#access-levels

questions.question_text:
You need to consider the underlined segment to establish whether it is accurate.

A customer service manager requires the __Append__ access level to add new entitlement templates for customer service representatives.

You make use of Dynamics 365 Customer Service. You have recently acquired Omnichannel for Customer Service.

You want to make sure that the system automatically asks questions prior to the chat beginning.

Which of the following actions should you take?

choices.D: You should configure an SMS channel.
choices.A: You should configure a pre-conversation survey.
choices.C: You should configure a Teams channel.

discussion.content: Pre-chat survey will allow you to ask questions before the chat starts

questions.question_text:
You make use of Dynamics 365 Customer Service. You have recently acquired Omnichannel for Customer Service.

You want to make sure that an agent is unable to view a client’s credit card data in a live chat.

Which of the following actions should you take?

choices.D: You should configure a routing rule.
choices.B: You should configure a data masking rule.
choices.A: You should configure a business rule.

discussion.content: B - Data masking rule is correct

B C 
In your Twilio account, note the ACCOUNT SID and AUTH TOKEN values. These values are required to create the SMS configuration in the Omnichannel admin center app.
From https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/customer-service/configure-sms-channel-twilio?tabs=customerserviceadmincenter#get-twilio-account-details

questions.question_text:
You are employed as an administrator for your company’s Dynamics 365 for Customer Service environment.

You have been tasked with setting up Twilio SMS for the customer service division.

Which of the following is required for this configuration? (Choose two.)
